name: Lucky Tlhalerwa's Cybernetic Titan
description: Cybernetic Titan is a Wave survival game, In Cybernetic Titan you are Protagonist Sergeant John Kozack part of IMS ( Incursion Military Service ) a private military organization based in Gemstone Island Crystalville City The Events And Characters Of Cybernetic Titan are part of the Super Incursion Universe, You are working together with your teammate Corporal Sebastian McGregor, You are both trapped in a location of your selection from the available maps, You start off with a pistol and medicine ,Fight off converging enemy waves of The Global Terrorism Confederation the Terrorism Syndicate trying to destroy you, you must survive all 23 waves without dying once to successfully evacuate the location, You gain points by killing enemies and defeating waves these are used to purchase new guns and items either in the waves equipment menu a menu presented on screen after completing each wave which sells guns and attachments or the store which is a vendor machine which sells additional ammo, medicine and bombs ,the store can be found in various different locations on each map. You start off on equipment level 1 / 8 and only have access to level 1 gear you level up by successfully completing waves, you gain a new level per 2 waves, these levels grant you access to new more powerful guns, perks, air support and gun attachments, as you successfully survive multiple waves the total enemy count, enemy damage and health increase making it increasingly difficult and challenging to survive, You must keep up by upgrading your guns and equipment by purchasing powerful guns, applying better weapon attachments which alter weapon performance and increase mag size, purchasing useful perks and air support, airsupport includes missile storms, napalm strikes, carepackages Etc. This game includes a plethora of maps to choose from as follows ( Advanced City Tailor, Advanced City Petrol Station, Emergency Evacuation, Masa Primary School & More) Masa Primary School is based on a true real life government school. Additional maps will be incorporated into Cybernetic Titan the following is a list of confirmed maps ( Crystalville Shopping Mall, Devastation, Mosele-Wa-Pula CJSS Etc. ) We are happy and delighted to develop and incorporate new Community generated maps from images and map designs submitted by the community. Weapons: Cybernetic Titan includes: Ak-47, M16, AUG, As-Val, SVD-Dragunov, VSS, G36C, UMP, Makarov, Skorpion, Kriss Vector, FN-P90, ACR, Ballistic Knife, FG-42, Type 99 Nambu, Flash Bang Molotov + 15 More. Brand new community highly requested weapons will be incorporated into Cybernetic Titan... Enjoy Cybernetic Titan.
